description:
From his law office in Starke, Florida, Jesse Bernheim, Attorney at Law, provides unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout the state as well as all across the country who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. A top-rated trial lawyer with nearly 20 years of legal experience, Mr. Bernheim has achieved remarkable success fighting for the rights and entitlements of individuals and families dealing with legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Medical device and pharmaceutical litigation
  • Tobacco litigation
  • Products liability
  • Personal injury
  • Workplace accidents
  • First party insurance litigation

As one of the founding partners of Bernheim Kelley Battista and Bliss, LLC, which has law offices throughout Florida and Massachusetts, Mr. Bernheim has gained a reputation as a leader in personal injury law, and he has secured numerous substantial settlements and verdicts for his plaintiff clients. Among his most notable successes, he obtained a $54 million recovery for the victim of a defective hip product along with a $21 million verdict on behalf of a widow whose husband died from smoking.

Mr. Bernheim has also obtained many other settlements and verdicts well in excess of a million dollars, earning his membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. What's more, he has earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers along with many testimonials and referrals from his satisfied clients.

To schedule a free initial consultation with Jesse Bernheim, Attorney at Law, and to discuss how he can best help you secure the maximum amount of compensation you deserve, you can call his law office or visit his website to set up an appointment. He also currently offers virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with him.
